::Killfest::

Killfest looks at the transmission running through the Council base's 
comp screen. It had been picked up by the base.

"Let the Maximals die," Killfest says, walking toward the exit with 
DrillBit, "We have other issues to attend to."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Sphink watched the maximal geting attacked. He grimaced. "Hmmm." 
he sent a 
> comm to drillbit. "The maximals are outnumbered and out gunned. 
Should we 
> send aid or leave them there to die?" he didnt care witch way 
besides the 
> alliance factor. Without the maximals it would be a lot harder to 
take them 
> out eventualy.
